net.sf.rcer.conn.connections
Class ProvidedConnectionData

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.rcer.conn.connections.ProvidedConnectionData
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConnectionData
public class ProvidedConnectionData
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConnectionData

A wrapper for the connection data provided by a IConnectionProvider to ensure that the provider ID is supplied with the connection ID.

Author:
vwegert

Specified by:
getConnectionDataID in interface IConnectionData
Returns:
the ID of the connection data set. Note that this is NOT the ID of the actual connection.

isDirectConnection

public boolean isDirectConnection()
Specified by:
isDirectConnection in interface IConnectionData
Returns:
true if the connection is a direct connection, false if load balancing is used.
See Also:
IConnectionData.getConnectionType()

isLoadBalancedConnection

public boolean isLoadBalancedConnection()
Specified by:
isLoadBalancedConnection in interface IConnectionData
Returns:
true if load balancing is used, false if the connection is a direct connection.
See Also:
IConnectionData.getConnectionType()

getConnectionType

public ConnectionType getConnectionType()
Specified by:
getConnectionType in interface IConnectionData
Returns:
the connection type. If a direct connection is used, an application server and a system number must be provided. If a messages server is used, the message server, the port and the group name must be provided.
